alert.note: Alert for East Carroll; Morehouse; Richland; West Carroll (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 1:32AM CDT until April 05 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Morehouse Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Southwestern East Carroll Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Richland Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Southwestern West Carroll Parish in northeastern Louisiana... * Until 230 AM CDT. * At 131 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Richwood, or 11 miles south of Monroe, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Buckner around 135 AM CDT. Alto around 145 AM CDT. Start around 150 AM CDT. Rayville around 155 AM CDT. Goodwill around 225 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Oak Ridge and Epps. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: East Carroll; Morehouse; Richland; West Carroll
